summary: The immersion mod for Bounty Hunting! With this mod, you\'ll be able to kill/capture bandits and take them to justice. Wanted posters are scattered all around Skyrim, either kill or capture your target to claim dynamically altered bounties. Kill them and bring their heads as proof. Spare them and escort them safely to the Sigil Of Justice.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img827/3117/photo1lu.png[/img][/center]
 

[center][color=#ffa500][size=6]Welcome To Immersive Bounty Hunting[/size][/color][/center]
[center][youtube]JO952CgxAQs[/youtube][youtube]nvn_BGSo6w8[/youtube][/center]
[center]Thanks to Gopher for featuring my mod in \"Skylight 1 (Skyrim Mod Preview) : Immersive Bounty Hunting\" :D[/center]
[center]Thanks to Gopher for showing my mod in his \"Skyrim Mod Sanctuary 57 : Achieve This, Lock Overhaul and No Sneak Attack Sound\" :D[/center]

[center][size=5]Please always read the description[/size][/center]
[center][color=#b22222][size=5]And be sure to endorse and vote, if you like this mod.[/size][/color][/center]


[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img849/2406/infosvq.png[/img][/center]

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]Immersive Bounty Hunting is a new mod that aims to bring immersion to the otherwise bland vanilla bounty hunting system. It features tough custom bandits for you to kill/capture. Once killed, take their skulls as proof to the Sigil of Justice(Bounty Hunters Guild) to claim your reward. If you want to make things more challenging try to capture the bandit alive! Once captured, you\'ll have to escort your prisoner to the Sigil, while the harsh lands of Skyrim will make your job a lot tougher! Be prepared to protect your prisoner at all costs from rival bandits, draugrs, dragons and bunnies!
  

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img543/1020/photo4s.png[/img][/center]
 
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]Bandits have pillaged and marauded their way across the lands of Skyrim for centuries. The Sigil of Justice has come into being, a fully independent organization bound to hunt down every last scum off the face of Nirn! In this mod, the player has been given a chance to take part in the purging of the land of the first men from vile bandits that have caused nothing but misery, death and deceit. 
 

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img651/769/photo1t.png[/img][/center]
 
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]As of now, 10 highly customized bandits have been scattered across Skyrim for you to kill or capture. These bandits are known throughout the nine holds of Skyrim, and their faces have been etched on posters scattered all across the land. These bandits have varying bounties on their name and the able bodied men and women of Skyrim have been beckoned to act and bring these brigands to justice, dead or alive! Capturing the bandit alive shall give the player a much higher reward.
 

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img10/3724/photo1re.png[/img][/center][LIST]

[*]10 highly customized bandits. Can be killed or captured! The capture system relies upon tactics. Plan your hits cautiously. When the bandit\'s health is low enough, a pop up shall appear with two options. One will allow you to accept the bandit\'s yield while the other allows you to continue combat and kill the bandit.
[*]Once the yield is accepted, the bandit shall be equipped with prisoner clothes and his hands shall be bound.
[*]At this point, the player has to safely escort the bandit across the wilderness to the Sigil of Justice (in Whiterun) alive.
[*]Escorting the prisoner safely can be quite a task. Be prepared to protect them at any cost, if you want to bring them alive. If the prisoner dies along the way, then the quest changes and the only thing left to do is to take the prisoner\'s head as proof.
[*]Getting the prisoner alive can be a challenging task, therefore a much higher bounty reward is given to the player, if successful.
[*]The prisoner shall follow you wherever you go, don\'t exploit this as it can make their chances of surviving bleak.
[*]Keep an eye out for your followers, as sometimes the followers will take matters into their own hands and finish the bandits off themselves.
[/LIST]
 

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img40/1276/locats.png[/img][/center]
  
[center][color=#ff8c00]The Bounty Hunters Guild (Sigil of Justice) is located just outside Whiterun.[/color][/center]

The bandits are located as follows :

class : 2h barbarian

>5 [color=#b22222]Eduard Valodius[/color]
class : 1h warrior
location : Eastmarch

>6[color=#a52a2a] Miles Mercius[/color]
class : Ih knight
location : Eastmarch

>7 [color=#800080]Vannona Moorsmith[/color]
class : elemental sorcerer
location : Falkreath Wilderness

>8 [color=#008000]Ma\'Jidarr[/color]
class : rogue
location : Winterhold

>9 [color=#008000]Ja\'Fizar[/color]
class : rogue
location : The Rift

>10 [color=#ffa07a]Faulgor[/color]
class : Ranger
location : The Pale
 

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img856/1941/photo5y.png[/img][/center]
  
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> A LOT of features are planned and in-development.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> The Guild shall be seeing new followers.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> A storyline shall be incorporated with the Guild and its members.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> Custom bandit bosses will also be incorporated. They will be insanely tough to track and to kill or capture, with their own custom 
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]appearances and dialog

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> Yield system shall be seeing more improvement. Follower responsiveness will also be improved.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> More depth and immersion to be added.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> Creatures in addition to bandits also planned.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> Dynamically varying bounties.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> Execution events for captured criminals.
 

[center][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img15/8052/faqsag.png[/IMG][/center]
  
[LIST][*]Why does my follower(s) keep killing the bandit?[/LIST]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG][color=#ff8c00]> Follower responsiveness depends upon many factors. Default behavior, Combat AI etc etc. Not to mention the usage of follower mods that change the way they behave. UFO followers should give you best results, this has been tested extensively, but to be completely safe, tell your follower to wait at a certain location before engaging a bandit[/color]

[LIST][*]The bandits breaks \'\'bound hands\'\' animation when sprinting[/LIST]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG][color=#ff8c00]> Sadly, its the vanilla animation that had to be used for this mod. The vanilla animation tends to not function correctly when the prisoner sprints. This has been minimized as much as possible, as it cannot be completely fixed.[/color]

[LIST][*]The bandits follows too close to me[/LIST]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG][color=#ff8c00]> He/she has been scripted to do that, otherwise they\'ll keep getting lost or left behind.[/color]

[LIST][*]The bandits keep dying. Its too hard to escort them.[/LIST]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG][color=#ff8c00]> Well that\'s the challenge. The higher \'\'alive\'\' bounty is thus justified.[/color] 
 

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img22/329/updatessy.png[/img][/center]
 
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/958/nbspcopie.png[/IMG]> Version 1.0 - Initial tested release. 


[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img839/9810/compats.png[/img][/center]
 
> This mod should be compatible with almost every mod out there, as the mod author as well as BETA testers have had over 100-150+ mods installed and running.


[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img15/7360/photo3e.png[/img][/center]
 
> Installing Immersive Bounty Hunting is very simple and can be done in the following ways :
[LIST]
[*]Automatic Installation : 
Use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] (further explanations on usage of the NMM on the Nexus forums!) ([color=#00ff00]recommended[/color])
[*]Manual Installation : ([color=#ff0000]not recommended[/color])
Extract all files into Skyrim\'s Data folder, normally located at (\"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\Steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data\").
Once you\'ve extracted all the files, check that the mod is activated by selecting \"Data Files\" from the Skyrim Launcher\'s screen, ensuring that \"ImmersiveBountyHunting.esp\" and \"ImmersiveBountyHunting_Bandits.esm\" are checked.
[/LIST]


[center][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/5295/photo1if.png[/IMG][/center]
 
> Uninstalling should be done with the NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) or manually, depending on the way you used to install Immersive Bounty Hunting :[LIST]
[*]Automatic Uninstallation : 
Click the uninstall button in the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] (further explanations on usage of the NMM on the Nexus forums!) 
[*]Manual Uninstallation : 
Delete the following files from Skyrim\'s Data folder (\"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\Steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data\") :[/LIST]
> ImmersiveBountyHunting.esp (File)
> ImmersiveBountyHunting_Bandits.esm (File)
> Meshes/Mitsarugi/WantedPoster (Folder)
> Meshes/Mitsarugi/SigilOfJusticeSign01.nif (File)
> Scripts/Mitsarugi_SetQuestStageOnPickUp.pex (File)
> Scripts/Mitsarugi_StartQuestOnPickUp.pex (File)
> Scripts/Mitsarugi_YieldSystem.pex (File)
> Scripts/QF__0301530D.pex (File)
> Scripts/TIF__03015DD5.pex (File)
> Scripts/TIF__0301633D.pex (File)
> Scripts/Source/QF__0301530D.psc (File)
> Scripts/Source/TIF__03015DD5.psc (File)
> Scripts/Source/TIF__0301633D.psc (File)
